KeyboardInterrupt:
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for i, req in enumerate(api_req_gen):
    name = Path(req.url).name
    out = path/name
    if not out.exists():
        try:
            wget.download(req.url, out=str(out))
        except Exception as e:
            print(e)
            pass
    if i>50:
        break
{% endraw %}
